about_the_game:
In Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe, you take on the role of a leader tasked with guiding your cavemen tribe to prosperity. Your main goal is to establish a stable supply chain to ensure your people do not starve nor freeze. You'll need to mine resources, hunt wild animals, and explore the map to discover new opportunities for your tribe.



As you progress, you'll unlock new jobs and production options that allow you to create more advanced items and build better buildings. You can choose between different building materials for walls and roofs, allowing for a high level of customization as you build your tribe's homes and structures.



With careful planning and resource management, your tribe will grow and flourish, with new members being born into the community. But be warned - as your tribe grows, so too will the challenges it faces. You will need to be prepared to face the increasing demand for food and drink, warmth and housing, medicine and other threats to your tribe's survival.

Will you be able to lead your tribe to prosperity and create a thriving civilization, or will your people freeze and starve under your leadership? The fate of your tribe is in your hands in Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe.

In Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe, you take on the role of a leader tasked with guiding your cavemen tribe to prosperity. Your main goal is to establish a stable supply chain to ensure your people do not starve nor freeze. You'll need to mine resources, hunt wild animals, and explore the map to discover new opportunities for your tribe.



As you progress, you'll unlock new jobs and production options that allow you to create more advanced items and build better buildings. You can choose between different building materials for walls and roofs, allowing for a high level of customization as you build your tribe's homes and structures.



With careful planning and resource management, your tribe will grow and flourish, with new members being born into the community. But be warned - as your tribe grows, so too will the challenges it faces. You will need to be prepared to face the increasing demand for food and drink, warmth and housing, medicine and other threats to your tribe's survival.

Will you be able to lead your tribe to prosperity and create a thriving civilization, or will your people freeze and starve under your leadership? The fate of your tribe is in your hands in Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.15
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530
  • Storage: 2100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2100 MB available space

name: Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Storage: 2100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or heigher
  • Processor: 3 GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 2100 MB available space

short_description: Experience the challenges and triumphs of leading a tribe in Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe. Explore, mine, hunt, and build your way to success. Customizable buildings, resource management, and population growth make every playthrough unique.
